The Routing Loop

Wednesdays 11 AM PT / 2 PM ET / 7 PM UK

Twitch LinkedIn
21 May 2025

VPN & SD-WAN & Direct Connect (Hybrid)

Hosts:
Jamie Wenzel

Guests:
Ankit Chadha, Principal Networking Solutions Architect
Jaywant Kapadnis , Sr System Development Engineer

ðŸ“… Add to Calendar

Abstract:
Join us for an interactive deep die on building resilient hybrid networks. We will cover the ins and outs of Direct Connect, Site to Site VPN and how to configure an SDWAN using Transit Gateway Connect -- step by step. we'll discuss Direct Connect, Site to Site VPN, and provide a deep dive (including a demo) of integrating your favorite SDWAN vendor with AWS Cloud WAN Whether you're a cloud network pro, or just getting started, join us and bring your questions! This session is built for discussion and real time answers!
